title: Stan Smith 80s Shoes

They're crafted with a rich leather upper and refined through details and shaping. And, of course, they come in the classic Stan Smith colorway and are finished with an illustration of Stan's face on the tongue label.

Sport and LEGO® toys — two activities that can keep you hooked for hours. And they come together perfectly in these juniors' adidas running shoes. While they have a lightweight textile upper, the outsole is fully LEGO® brick-inspired. So kick them up, and let everyone see the iconic bricks.

title: Znsored HI Shoes
subtitle: Sportswear
description:
Box-fresh or broken in. These adidas skate-style shoes look good either way. Resting on a durable rubber outsole, the mid-cut upper is crafted from canvas and suede. A padded collar combines with LIGHTMOTION+ cushioning to keep your feet wrapped in comfort. Simply team them with crop or tapered pants.

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Canvas upper; LIGHTMOTION+ cushioning; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Supports the Better Cotton Initiative; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Core Black / Core Black; Product code: GZ2292

title: Disney Aladdin Genie Stan Smith Shoes
subtitle: Originals
description:
For over 50 years, the adidas Stan Smith sneaker has solidified its place as a style icon. Now the classic silhouette gets a magical update with these shoes inspired by Genie, from Disney's "Aladdin." Make a statement with a bright blue backdrop that will add a pop to any outfit. The synthetic leather upper has a heat-reactive heel patch — when it warms up, a different graphic appears. The heel patches are a reminder that "It's not easy being green," so it's important to do our best for the planet.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Synthetic leather upper; Synthetic leather lining; Heat-reactive heel tab; Rubber outsole; ©Disney; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Pantone / Cloud White / Core Black; Product code: HP5579
colors: Pantone / Cloud White / Core Black

title: D.O.N. Issue #4 Miles Morales Basketball Shoes
subtitle: Children Basketball
description:
The future of basketball is all about speed, and Donovan Mitchell is as fast as they come. These kids' signature shoes from Mitchell and adidas Basketball are built specifically to elevate the on-court movements of one of the game's fastest, most dynamic scorers. Ultralight Lightstrike teams up with a LIGHTLOCK upper for a snug fit and an explosive propulsion system that won't slow down you superstar in the making. A collaboration with Marvel, they feature graphics inspired by "Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse. A totally unique rubber outsole is designed to generate traction where they need it most, so they'll have total support on every head fake and cut. Mitchell's Spida logo and signature graphics provide the finishing touch.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; LIGHTLOCK upper; Lightweight, cushioned feel; Textile lining; Lightstrike cushioning; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Vivid Red / Core Black; Product code: HR1627

subtitle: Men's Golf

The 360Wrap design locks in and supports your feet through 18 holes and beyond. An INSITE® sockliner offers cushioning for optimal fit and balance, and the SPIKEMORE traction outsole provides solid grip throughout your entire round.

description:
For snowy commutes or quiet backcountry trails, these adidas by Stella McCartney boots are what you'll want to lace on. For many reasons. One is because they're insulated, which means that the cold isn't something you have to worry about. Another reason is that with the cold, often comes the elements — something these shoes protect against with a water-resistant upper. Then there's the fact that they just look good, with a high-cut, bulky build that makes an impression no matter the time or place.

To reduce our reliance on virgin materials, we make sure that our vegan alternatives also contain a minimum of 25% recycled content.

description:

When they've logged their last mile, send them back and we'll recycle them into something new.

We're moving toward new ways of returning and remaking. Products made to be remade, not thrown away. Wear it out. Send it back. We'll remake it. A better choice for both you and the planet.

description:
The goal is to get better, then get better than that. So these adidas running shoes are made with a lower footprint than their previous version. They keep you fast across the miles with superlight Lightstrike cushioning and a flexible feel. That way, you run your fastest (soon to be known as your second fastest).

This product is made with a lower carbon footprint of 42% compared to a previous version. From raw material extraction, processing, packaging, all the way to the end of product's life, we calculate and communicate its carbon footprint, conforming to an internationally recognized standard: ISO 14067 
 
To reduce our footprint, we need to measure it. The concise footprint results made available to you, provide full transparency on the complete lifecycle of the product. This is just one of our initiatives to help reduce our footprint.

description:
Hike. Explore. Enjoy the freedom of the mountains. Part of a collaboration with Japanese outdoor label and wander, these adidas Terrex hiking shoes bring creative style to trail-ready hikers. From thru-hikes to weekend explorations, these lightweight hiking shoes offer next-generation comfort and support to extend your range on the trail. A BOOST midsole brings energy to every step to keep you moving on hikes long and short. The soft, supportive upper and adidas Primeknit collar hug your foot with form-fitting comfort that lets you hike longer. An internal frame and heel support add the stability to move with confidence over rocky terrain and uneven ground, while the Continental™ Rubber outsole maintains confident traction whether it's wet or dry. 

adidas TERREX is joining forces with Japanese avant-garde outdoor label and wander for a multi-seasonal collaboration, exploring the universal connectivity of humanity and nature. Both brands celebrate the love for the outdoors and are looking for creative ways to adopt this aesthetic for modern day city life and outdoor adventures. and wander was founded in 2011 in Tokyo by Keita Ikeuchi and Mihoko Mori after they met as designers at Issey Miyake. Their fashion expertise paired with the admiration for the outdoors elevates adidas TERREX to create a unique collection combining contemporary wearability with mountain ready functionality. This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

description:
adidas 4DFWD 2 redefines forward motion combining the unique, groundbreaking innovation of a 3D printed midsole with a new upper construction and a Continental outsole for extra grip. With every stride, the adidas 4DFWD 2 midsole compresses forward, reducing braking forces and transforming the impact energy into forward motion. The result is a smooth ride with less stop-and-go pounding on pavement. The Continental outsole grippy rubber outsole provides traction on wet and dry surfaces to keep you going in all conditions, and the adidas PRIMEKNIT+ upper wraps the foot with a new fit that enhances movement.

description:
Who says running needs to be uncomfortable? These shoes are designed to help you run comfortable every time, on any terrain. From a precisely balanced mix of Bounce and increased Boost in the midsole to a new padded tongue and heel patch construction, experience comfort with every step. 

Supernova 2 is now made with a lower carbon footprint of 12% compared to the 2020 Supernova. From raw material extraction, processing, packaging, all the way to the end of product's life, we calculate and communicate its carbon footprint, conforming to an internationally recognized standard: ISO 14067 

To reduce our footprint, we need to measure it. The concise footprint results made available to you, provide full transparency on the complete lifecycle of the product. This is just one of our initiatives to help reduce our footprint.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Boost and Bounce midsole; Reduced carbon footprint; Direct injected TPU outsole; Padded tongue and heel; Weight: 8 ounces (size 7); Midsole drop: 9mm (heel: 25mm / toe: 16mm); Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Beam Pink; Product code: GY3528
colors: Ecru Tint / Night Metallic / Solar Green

description:
It was true then, and it's true now. adidas designs shoes with athletes in mind. These running shoes can be worn anytime, but they're still equipped with some innovative tech. The lightweight mesh upper lets air flow, and the Cloudfoam midsole gives a springy, cushioned feel. A soft sockliner keeps feet feeling supported, no matter how often you put them through a long walk or workout.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Breathable mesh upper; Textile lining; Cloudfoam midsole; OrthoLite® sockliner; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Dash Grey / Halo Silver / Silver Metallic; Product code: GW4133
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Core Black

description: When it comes to the adidas Superstar shoes, little to no introduction is needed. Started on the basketball court, made even more famous on hip-hop stages, found just about everywhere else after that… you know the story. Lace your kid into these rubber-shell-toe sneakers and have them join the legacy. They're all about carving your own path — evident from all the people and places they've found themselves on and in. So when kids step out in these shoes, they're joining the footsteps of all the game-changers and rule-breakers before them.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Synthetic upper; OrthoLite® sockliner; Textile lining; Rubber midsole and outsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Beam Green; Product code: GW2171

description:
The ultimate platform for heavy lifting. These adidas weightlifting shoes keep you stable under the heaviest loads thanks to their raised heel and high-density midsole. That tough-as-nails canvas upper uses a lace-and-strap combo to keep you firmly locked in. The rubber outsole is specifically designed to plant your feet on the mat.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Durable canvas upper with hook-and-loop instep strap; Locked-down feel; High-density midsole; Low-profile grippy rubber outsole; Shoe weight: 466 g; Midsole drop: 22 mm (heel: 33 mm / forefoot: 11 mm); Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Linen Green / Cloud White / Beam Pink; Product code: GY8925
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Grey Three

description: Ultimate simplicity for three decades and counting. This men's version of the Gazelle honors the favorite version of 1991, with the same materials, colors, textures and proportions as the original. The nubuck upper features contrast 3-Stripes and heel tab that echo the early-'90s style.
details: Nubuck upper; Synthetic overlays; Synthetic lining for comfort; Debossed Trefoil logo on tongue; Trefoil logo on heel tab; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Dgh Solid Grey / White / Gold Metallic; Product code: BB5480
colors: Collegiate Burgundy / Cloud White / Gold Metallic

description:
Running-inspired style made for everyday exploration. These adidas NMD_V3 Shoes honor the cutting-edge design of the original '80s-inspired sneaker. The classic 3-Stripes, heel patch and sockliner all get global with "3 Stripe Life" printed in multiple languages. Textile materials add a comfortable touch while the BOOST midsole returns the energy you put into every step. A grippy rubber outsole helps you keep your footing on the slickest of city sidewalks.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Carbon; Product code: FZ5964
colors: Grey One / Off White / Halo Silver

description:
When the game is on the line, Trae Young ensures the ball finds his hands. These juniors' signature basketball shoes keep that fearless streak alive with the classic 3-Stripes that wrap around the forefoot. The sock-like fit hugs your feet to keep you comfortable. adidas BOOST on the heel combines with a Lightstrike midsole to give you a responsive feel with every move you make on the court.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; Lightstrike cushioning; BOOST midsole; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Core Black / Team Solar Green; Product code: H06486

description:
Daily errands or daily fun, every day deserves some flair. True to their name, these adidas shoes make an impression with an elevated platform outsole and a smooth coated leather upper. Metallic details glam it up, because bling is never a bad thing. 

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Coated leather upper; Synthetic leather lining; Mesh sockliner; TPU heel piece; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Wonder Mauve / Wonder Mauve / Silver Metallic; Product code: GW1923
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Core Black

description:
South African fashion brand Thebe Magugu tells stories through design, and the bird-of-paradise print is one of unbridled joy and freedom. A beacon of hope, the print takes over these adidas shoes. Stand tall on the elevated platform outsole and show it off. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Thebe Magugu print; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Power Red / Cloud White / Core Black; Product code: GY9561

description: In a constantly changing world, be part of the change for good. Join our mission to help end plastic waste by slipping on these adidas NMD_R1 Strap shoes. As expected for an NMD, the signature elements are there. You have the sock-like knit upper, the plush BOOST midsole and, of course, the iconic heel plugs. One big difference? The strap, which replaces the laces to create a streamlined, modern look.
details: Adjustable strap closure; Stretch knit upper; Hugs the foot; Synthetic lining; BOOST midsole; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Collegiate Gold / Collegiate Gold; Product code: HP2360
colors: Halo Blush / Cloud White / Simple Brown
